articles.title: Why are so many people getting sick from eating cucumbers? - NBC News
articles.summary: Why are so many people getting sick from eating cucumbers? Salmonella outbreaks linked to cucumbers have sickened hundreds of people since last year, drawing attention to the problem of contaminated irrigation water on farms. Heat from cooking can eliminate salmonella, but when fresh produce is eaten raw, there is typically no “kill step” for bacteria. Leila Register / NBC News;...
